name: Stephen wolf
review: The noise cancellation is also arguably worse. While I hear less coming through on these than I do the 900s what I do hear sounds distorted and weird - making it more noticeable.

name: Jonathon liam
review: it's amazing. my apartment is under construction and always its annoying me but this headphones definitely help me to escape from those horrible noises!!!!

name: Dave Nathan
review: I agree with the other low scoring reviews. I get the same hissing noise when the headphones are idle. Also their LDAC High Definition Sound only works with Android and nothing else...

name: Otniel C.
review: I believe the pair I got are defective. the left side of the headphones play much louder then the right

name: B .Willis
review: In terms of battery life, they compare pretty well with Bose, although Cleer Enduro at 60 hours per charge is the knockout winner.

name: Kindle Customer
review: All the controls are touch controlled at your ear. Great sound, comfortable, fast charging. Made a great gift, and a big hit
